problem.markdown:
Answer the following question by reviewing the data source for the dashboard objects.
>>Where do the sales figures shown in the charts come from?<< ( ) SQL database ( ) Excel data model (x) Sales Worksheet ( ) Products Worksheet ( ) Dashboard - CA Worksheet
[explanation] The sales figure comes from the Sales table located in the Sales Worksheet. [explanation]
problem.p: Answer the following question by reviewing the data source for the dashboard objects.
Where do the sales figures shown in the charts come from?

choicegroup.label: Where do the sales figures shown in the charts come from?

div.p: The sales figure comes from the Sales table located in the Sales Worksheet.
